step.cmd: On the Palette menu, click the User Task element.
In the Editor area, click within a pool where you want to place the user task.
step.stepresult: The user task is added to the diagram.

step.cmd: In the Properties view pane, complete all fields (mandatory fields are indicated with an asterisk).
step.info: For more information about how to complete the fields in the Properties view pane, see section User Task properties.

step.cmd: On the menu bar, click File Save . Alternatively, on the toolbar, you can click .
step.stepresult: The user task and its properties are saved.
